author: A_Brickset_user
title: Director
review:
Okay, guys, I don't actually have the SET, but I have made it out of my LEGO supplies, so I know what I'm talkin' about, Okay?

Pros:

* Good head
* you can never have too many studios sets!
* you can never have too many legs!

Cons:

Too common.

author: woodall_aidan
title: This is just Steven Spielburg!
review: This set is good, just there are too many sets with the director (Spielburg). If this set was a limited edition set and it was the only set with this figure, it would probably have been rarer. I give this a 4/5.
